channel.title: Changing NPC Drops
channel.description: I figured that change NPC's drops was simple. Just go to npcdrops.cfg, but when I did that, I went down to my monster (jad-2745) and beside his name was the item he droped (fire cape-6750). So I change the fire cape to white party hat (1048). Saved. Compiled. And then ran my server. I went over and killed a jad. Still dropped a firecape. Why didn't it drop a white party hat? Can someone please tell me how to change NPC drops?

item.title: Changing NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Vladie Vladie
item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

Try looking in your Item2.java and search for Jad. Then change the items he drops there also.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

I figured that change NPC’s drops was simple. Just go to npcdrops.cfg, but when I did that, I went down to my monster (jad-2745) and beside his name was the item he droped (fire cape-6750). So I change the fire cape to white party hat (1048). Saved. Compiled. And then ran my server. I went over and killed a jad. Still dropped a firecape. Why didn’t it drop a white party hat? Can someone please tell me how to change NPC drops?
